column1: I am in my mid 40's and still suffer from breakouts from many products. This cream is hydrating and does not cause any clogging at all. I have used it now for 6 weeks and have yet to break out from it. I am in love with this and this Walmart seller price is 1/4 of what most sellers ask. The shipping was free and timely! I have already stocked up as its too good to be true!
